title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.208 - Mentally disordered patient
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.208 - Mentally disordered patient

State Regulations
A person with a chronic psychiatric impairment and whose
adaptive functioning is moderately impaired. This patient requires continuous
supervision and can be expected to benefit from an active rehabilitation
program effort designed to improve his adaptive functioning and develop a
potential for replacement in a less protected living
environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.208

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
